      • onActivate

        public abstract void onActivate(@Nonnull
                                Experiment experiment,
                                @Nonnull
                                java.lang.String userId,
                                @Nonnull
                                java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> attributes,

                                Variation variation,
                                @Nonnull
                                LogEvent event)
        onActivate called when an activate was triggered
        Parameters:
        experiment - - The experiment object being activated.
        userId - - The userId passed into activate.
        attributes - - The filtered attribute list passed into activate
        variation - - The variation that was returned from activate.
        event - - The impression event that was triggered.
